Personal

  Simple-CV: A minimalistic, multi-page CV template with BibLaTeX support.

  eth-cs-notes: Lecture notes and cheatsheets for Master’s in Computer Science at ETH Zurich.

  academy-awards: Interactive plots to toy with some Academy Awards statistics.

Research

  poser: Learning in-the-wild Temporal 3D Pose Estimation from MoCap Data, Master’s thesis.

  bert-adv-embed: Adversarial perturbations on word embeddings of BERT.

  AV Digits Database: Audiovisual dataset for normal, whispered and silent speech.

  AlgoTrade: Web-based algorithmic trading framework, BSc final year project.

Hackathon

  gleisurfer: App concept for helping railway clearance through AR and 3D reconstrcution.

  Wallery: Augmented reality art gallery and NFT marketplace concept.

  diff-annotate: Data annotation tool with proposal generation and person detection support.
